front.title: CMVP approved security functions : CMVP validation authority updates to ISOIEC 24759

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: The approved security functions listed in this publication replace the ones listed in ISO/IEC 19790 Annex C and ISO/IEC 24759 6.15, within the context of the Cryptographic Module Validation Program (CMVP). As a validation authority, the CMVP may supersede Annex C in its entirety.
